scripts.download-pipy-macos-x64: mkdir -p download && cd download && curl -o pipy.tar.gz https://pipy-oss-1255617643.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com/repo/pipy-nightly/x86_64/binary/pipy-nightly-202404011409-macos-x86_64.tar.gz && tar -xzf pipy.tar.gz && cp -f ./usr/local/bin/pipy ../src-tauri/bin/pipy-x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.download-pipy-macos: mkdir -p download && cd download && curl -o pipy.tar.gz https://pipy-oss-1255617643.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com/repo/pipy-nightly/aarch64/binary/pipy-nightly-202404011409-macos-aarch64.tar.gz && tar -xzf pipy.tar.gz && cp -f ./usr/local/bin/pipy ../src-tauri/bin/pipy-aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.download-pipy-windows: mkdir -p download && cd download && curl -o pipy.zip https://pipy-oss-1255617643.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/repo/pipy-repo-nightly/win32/binary/pipy-repo-nightly-202404011409-win32-x86_64.zip && unzip pipy.zip && cp -f pipy.exe ../src-tauri/bin/pipy-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
scripts.download-pipy-linux: mkdir -p download && cd download && curl -o pipy.tar.gz https://pipy-oss-1255617643.cos-website.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com/repo/pipy-nightly/x86_64/binary/pipy-nightly-202404011409-generic_linux-x86_64.tar.gz && tar -xzf pipy.tar.gz && cp -f ./usr/local/bin/pipy ../src-tauri/bin/pipy-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
